issue.title: [Rust] Buffer<T> should have an Iterator
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2381](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2381). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It should be possible to obtain an Iterator from a Buffer<T> so that it is easy to access the values.

 

PR: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/1823
